text: Babandi bameneshejwe mu ngo zabo bitanyuze mukuri, uretse gusa kuba bavuga bati "Nyagasani wacu ni Allah". Nyamara iyo Allah ataza kurinda abantu (akarengane) akoresheje abandi, inzu z’abihayimana, insengero, amasinagogi ndetse n’imisigiti ivugirwamo izina rya Allah kenshi, byari gusenywa. Kandi rwose Allah azatabara abaharanira (idini rye). Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Umunyembaraga uhebuje, Ushobora byose
